Continuous improvement framework: implications for academia

Key: temponi_continuous_2005

Author(s): Temponi, Cecilia

Year: 2005

Abstract: Purpose – To analyze the main elements of continuous improvement (CI) in higher education and the concerns of academia’s stakeholders in the implementation of such an approach. Suggests guidelines for the development of a culture more receptive to the implementation and maintenance of a CI approach in higher education.
